argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lsmcom.s | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_id | |- ( G e. Abel -> G e. Abel ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_subgss | |- ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> T C_ ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 5 | 3 | #P_subgss | |- ( U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> U C_ ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 1 | #P_lsmcomx | |- ( ( G e. Abel /\ T C_ ( Base ` G ) /\ U C_ ( Base ` G ) ) -> ( T .(+) U ) = ( U .(+) T ) ) |
| 7 | 2, 4, 5, 6 | #P_syl3an | |- ( ( G e. Abel /\ T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> ( T .(+) U ) = ( U .(+) T ) ) |
